Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav scored an unbeaten 68 off 26 balls
Hong Kong could only manage 152/5 in their 20 overs
India qualified for the Super 4 stage of the Asia Cup 2022
Miscellaneous Highlights: India won the toss and were put into bat
Babar Hayat and Nizakat Khan forged a 39-run partnership
Ravindra Jadeja bagged the wicket of Babar Hayat
Others: Arshdeep Singh, Bhuvneshwar Kumar, Ravindra Jadeja and Avesh Khan picked one wicket each for India
Suryakumar Yadav and Kohli accumulated 78 runs in the final five overs
Suryakumar Yadav was adjudged the Player of the Match
